Text.content: The root administrator has all permissions in OpenCms. This user automatically has all other roles, having the rights of these roles. The predefined user Admin is root administrator. The role is important and at least the Admin user should have this role.

Text.content: Database managers can manage modules and import/export data from the database.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Workplace managers can manage scheduled jobs, search indices, property definitions, resource histories, and the workplace tools.
